snippet: Former Senator John Danforth denounced the ugly nature of American politics on Tuesday while eulogizing the Missouri auditor, Tom Schweich, suggesting that political bullying and an anti-Semitic whisper campaign had led his friend to kill himself.
abstract: Former Missouri Sen John Danforth suggests during eulogy of state auditor Tom Schweich that political bullying and anti-Semitic whisper campaign may have been cause of Schweich's suicide.
lead_paragraph: Former Senator John Danforth denounced the ugly nature of American politics on Tuesday while eulogizing the Missouri auditor, Tom Schweich, suggesting that political bullying and an anti-Semitic whisper campaign had led his friend to kill himself.

headline.main: Missouri: Bullying Denounced at Auditor’s Memorial
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Bullying Denounced at Auditor’s Memorial
